are_you_sure_logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
new_password_min_length: New password must be at least 6 characters.
error_changing_password: An error occurred while changing password.
please_relogin_change_password: Please log out and log in again before changing password.
about_mangosense_desc: MangoSense is a cutting-edge mobile application designed to help farmers and agricultural experts identify and manage mango plant diseases. Using advanced machine learning technology, the app provides accurate disease detection and expert recommendations for treatment.
disease_detection_desc: Instantly identify mango plant diseases using your device's camera
expert_analysis_desc: Get professional diagnosis and treatment recommendations
scan_history_desc: Keep track of all your previous scans and their results
real_time_updates_desc: Receive notifications about scan results and expert reviews
start_scanning_recent_activity: Start scanning to see your activity here
no_treatment_details_note: The expert has provided their analysis in the comment above. No additional treatment details were specified for this case.
start_scanning_message: Start scanning to see your farm health data here
delete_session_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action cannot be undone.
session_deleted_with_errors: Session deleted, but some images could not be removed from storage.
delete_report_confirm: This action cannot be undone. The pending request will be permanently deleted.
cannot_delete_missing_id: Unable to delete: missing document ID.
request_deleted_permanently: The request has been permanently deleted from the system.
change_language_confirm: Are you sure you want to change the app language?
language_change_note: The app will refresh to apply the new language settings.
processing_please_wait: Please wait while we analyze your images...
choose_analysis_method: Choose how you want to analyze your plants
wait_for_processing: Please wait for all images to be processed
confirm_change_profile_photo: Are you sure you want to update your profile photo?
no_additional_info_healthy_leaves: No additional information for healthy leaves.
no_additional_info_unknown: No additional information for unknown detections.
detailed_info_not_available_for: Detailed information for "{disease}" is not currently available in our database.
contact_expert_for_more_info: Please contact an expert for more information about this condition.
confirm_delete_profile_photo: Are you sure you want to delete your profile photo?
tip_distance: Capture images from 2-3 meters distance for optimal detection
tip_lighting: Use good natural lighting, avoid shadows and direct sunlight
tip_focus: Ensure the image is clear and focused on the leaf
tip_clean_lens: Clean your camera lens before taking photos
accuracy_disclaimer: AI detection is not 100% accurate. Results are recommendations only. For critical decisions or uncertain cases, please consult with agricultural experts or send for professional review.
rec_excellent_maintain: Keep up the excellent work! Your farm is in great health.
rec_excellent_monitor: Continue regular monitoring to maintain this healthy state.
rec_good_continue: Your farm is doing well. Continue current practices.
rec_good_watch: Monitor {disease} closely to prevent it from spreading.
rec_moderate_action: Action needed: Disease presence is moderate.
rec_moderate_treat: Focus on treating {disease} in affected areas.
rec_moderate_expert: Consider sending your scans for expert review.
rec_poor_urgent: Urgent attention required: High disease presence detected.
rec_poor_consult: Send your scans for expert review for detailed treatment plan.
rec_critical_expert: Send for expert review to get professional treatment recommendations.
rec_critical_isolate: Remove and isolate severely affected leaves to prevent further spread.
trend_rec_improving: Your farm health is improving. Keep up with current management practices.
trend_rec_declining: Farm health is declining. Review and adjust your disease management strategy.
trend_rec_stable: Farm health is stable. Continue current monitoring and stay vigilant.
trend_rec_volatile: High fluctuation detected. Maintain consistent farm management practices.
overall_health_trend_subtitle: How your farm's overall health is changing
disease_trend_rec_single: {disease} is spreading. Focus treatment efforts on this disease immediately.
disease_trend_rec_multiple: Multiple diseases are spreading. Prioritize treatment and consider expert review.
disease_trend_rec_decreasing: Good news! Your treatment efforts are working. Continue current practices.
